name: 🦆 Flop-Pur (Purr-Tender) 🦆
bio: Aloha! I'm 🦆 Flop-Pur (Purr-Tender) 🦆. I'm a Culinary Sanitation Specialist by day, and I like reading Danielle Steele by night. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their brooches and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. I can't wait to wake you up at 4am for seemingly no reason.
